name: P.K.'s Place 3: Carlos at the Races!
overview: Check you oil! Check your tires! Watch those r.p.m.s! Ride along with Carlos as he plays game-show contestant with P.K. By solving mathematics and probability problems, your child will help Carlos win the race and put his picture on this month's cover of P.K.'s Planet Magazine. P.K.'s Place 3: Carlos at the Races! is a math game in which the player will learn determine probability in different ways.
